schema.example:
access_token=<jwt>; HttpOnly; Path=/; SameSite=Lax;
refresh_token=<jwt>; HttpOnly; Path=/; SameSite=Lax;

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of users to return per page

get.summary: Get all users with filters and pagination

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the user to retrieve

post.summary: Start playing track for authenticated user
Update track streaming state for authenticated user

get.summary: Get current track state for authenticated user
Get all playlists with pagination and filters
Get all albums with pagination and filters

delete.description: Deletes an album by its ID. Requires authentication.
